data_table.description: Sample ID, body site, analyte type, tumor status, histological type of sample, primary or metastatic tumor, and primary tumor location of participants with primary and metastatic colorectal cancer lesions and involved in the "Comparative Sequence Analysis Between Primary and Metastatic Colorectal Cancer Lesions" project.

variable.name: BODY_SITE
variable.description: Body site where sample was collected

variable.name: HISTOLOGICAL_TYPE
variable.description: Cell or tissue type or subtype of sample

variable.name: PRIMARY_METASTATIC_TUMOR
variable.description: Primary tumor, metastasis, or transformed cell line
